name: pnp-devproxy-mock-from-real-api
title: Auto-generate mocks from production traffic
shortDescription: Demonstrates how to use Dev Proxy's MockGeneratorPlugin to automatically generate mock files from real API traffic. Record once, mock forever - no manual mock creation needed.
longDescription: Demonstrates how to use Dev Proxy's MockGeneratorPlugin to automatically generate mock files from real API traffic. Record once, mock forever - no manual mock creation needed.

thumbnails.alt: Dev Proxy generating mock files from intercepted API requests

references.name: Get started with the Dev Proxy
references.description: The tutorial will introduce you to the Dev Proxy and show you how to use its features.

references.name: MockGeneratorPlugin documentation
references.description: Technical reference for the MockGeneratorPlugin that generates mock files from intercepted requests.

references.name: Record and export proxy activity
references.description: Instructions on how to record and export proxy activity with Dev Proxy.

references.name: Mock responses
references.description: Learn how to mock API responses with Dev Proxy.
